components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: On Call Engineers are Investigating an issue Call Failures From Subscribers To Philippines Twilio Phone Numbers

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue Call Failures From Subscribers To Philippines Twilio Phone Numbers. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Kingdom Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three

incident_updates.body:
Our carrier partner Three United Kingdom is conducting a planned maintenance from 21 June 2025 at 10:00 PDT until 22 June 2025 at 01:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for Three United Kingdom customers.

Impacted Products: Verify Silent Network Auth, Lookup SIM Swap, Lookup Identity Match, Legacy Identity MatchAndAttributes

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Twilio is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 04 June 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 26 June 2025 at 00:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays or failures delivering SMS and MMS to and from United States and Canada handsets via subset of long codes, short codes and toll free numbers.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

04 June 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 05 June 2025 at 00:00 PDT
11 June 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 12 June 2025 at 00:00 PDT
18 June 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 18 June 2025 at 20:00 PDT
25 June 2025 at 20:00 PDT until 26 June 2025 at 00:00 PDT
